code:
java
# .env.example

# Configurations de base

APP_NAME=Gestion API
APP_DESCRIPTION=Gestion des ressources
APP_PORT=8080

# Configurations de database PostgreSQL

DB_DRIVER=org.postgresql.Driver
DB_URL=jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/${DB_NAME}
DB_USER=postgres
DB_PASSWORD=password

# Configurations de Spring Security et JWT

SECURITY_JWT_SECRET=secretkey
SECURITY_JWT_EXPIRATION=86400

# Configurations de Swagger

SWAGGER_ENABLED=true
SWAGGER_UI_URL=/swagger-ui
